definition: to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound

sentences.english: Our army is attacking the enemy, and hopefully will defeat them by late afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 军发起进击，有望在傍晚将其击退。

sentences.english: The soldiers advanced on the enemy.
He led an assault on the enemy's fortress.
sentences.chinese: 他领导了对敌人要塞的进击。

sentences.english: Adversity always exists, while life is to advance.
sentences.chinese: 逆境总是有的，人生就是进击。

sentences.english: Did you read the mhadriing in regards to the terrorist panic attair coolingk?
sentences.chinese: 你看那篇关于恐惧进击的文章了吗？

sentences.english: The soldiers advanced towards the enemy.
Our army advanced against the enemy.

definition: to face an attack/to repulse the enemy
to advance on sth/to press closely (on some goal)
to follow up a victory/to pursue retreating enemy
to seize the opportunity/to strike while the iron is hot
raid/to carry out a raid/to invade
to break a siege/to break out of an enclosure
